title: 5 Blue Essence
body: So I recently made a pbe account, and it only provided me with 5 blue essence. I think when I made the account, the shop was bugged and I bought Katarina for full price 2 or 3 times lol. Help :( My pbe account ign is aluxisPBE

replies.body: Pbe accounts now get about 3000RP and 5BE to start with. They do get filled back up once you've dropped low enough.

I have had a PBE account since season 2 or 3 I don't remember correctly which I've regurarly played on too. Bought all the champions and a couple skins etc. Long story short, I've had lots of IP and RP in spare which is now 3300 RP and 5 BE. 
Is this supposed to happen?

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=GInKmj6j,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-10-17T00:47:07.375+0000)
>
> Pbe accounts now get about 3000RP and 5BE to start with. They do get filled back up once you've dropped low enough.

wow ok. I feel dumb lmao. thanks for the info xd
